ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EQ-Rangers] Dueling a Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, this is just too funny.  A bard that actually knows their class - and we are OVERPOWERED? hahaha This translates to - I want MY class to kick every other
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, this is just too funny. A bard that actually knows their class - and
we are OVERPOWERED? hahaha

This translates to - "I want MY class to kick every other classes butt -
therefore - they must be overpowered"

Sounds like Mr. Ranger here relies on a few techniques, mainly his bow -
and doesn't think it's fair he might have to rethink his stragtegy and
tactics.



>----- Original Message -----
>From: Gregory Callahan <tendril@...>
>To: <EQ-Rangers@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 12:00 PM
>Subject: [EQ-Rangers] Dueling a Bard
>
>
>> From: "Gregory Callahan" <tendril@...>
>>
>>
>> Last night I dueled a 22nd level bard friend in the Arena at Lake
>Rathe,
>> I was hoping I could really plink her with arrows and try to snare her
>wich
>> did work. BUT she soon found my range of my weapons and my minimum range
>for
>> the bow (meaning she was too close for me to fire). and she was always out
>> of range or too close for me to fire the bow. Now that said She on the
>other
>> hand could run me down even snared if she was singing the celos
>> acceleration. HOW is it even possible for a melee type to beat a Bard they
>> don't have to face you to hit you,cus they have an AOE with a huge range
>on
>> it, they can hit you with a DD well out of the range of the bow you can't
>> root them cus the sow song breaks it. if they stand toe to toe with you
>they
>> ghet stomped pretty bad but all they have to do is back off a bit and run
>> from you for a sec or two to regen. In my opinion the bards are the most
>> unbalanced class in the game. I can easily take down a wizzy or necro
>with
>> out much problem if I can ever get a root off on em a warror is a joke
>once
>> you hit em with snare and have plenty of arrows, I have not tried to
>fight
>> a druid or shamen yet but, at least I feel it is possible for me to beat
>em.
>> I am not so sure about a bard. anyone got any advise.
>>
>> Kaymen Darkwater
>> 20th Wood Elf Ranger
>> Tribunal
>>
>> >
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
